DirectX Version: 8.1 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported

#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Word Monaco_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Relax under the warm sun of the Mediterranean and play a unique blend of word-creation and solitaire. Learn what leisure is all about as you create words by moving letters from column to column over white sandy beaches. Use power-ups for bonus points - and when all of the letters are used, you'll move on to the next of 75 progressively difficult levels in 6 vibrant locations. With a word list of over 50,000+ words and 5 decks of varying difficulty, there are endless possibilities. So pack your suitcase and get set for several rounds of solitaire fun in Monaco!
